texts.name: Sam
texts.biography: Since ancient times, earth oil has wreaked havoc on the farmers of Jadame, erupting in fountains and laying waste to their crops and pastures. Sam, the daughter and apprentice of a skilled blacksmith, was the first to tame this black beast by forcing it into a pipe and making it heat her forge. Her inventions made earth oil into Burton's blood, food, and arms.

specialty.description: Increases the Speed of any Mechanics and Engineers by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 2 levels (rounded up).
specialty.name: Mechanic
